type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.ExternalModuleDependency
type.description:
*

A {@code ModuleDependency} is a {@link Dependency} on a module outside the current project hierarchy.

method.name: isChanging
method.description: * Returns whether or not Gradle should always check for a change in the remote repository. * * @see #setChanging(boolean)

method.name: setChanging
method.description: * Sets whether or not Gradle should always check for a change in the remote repository. If set to true, Gradle will * check the remote repository even if a dependency with the same version is already in the local cache. Defaults to * false. * * @param changing Whether or not Gradle should always check for a change in the remote repository * @return this

property.name: changing
property.description: * Returns whether or not Gradle should always check for a change in the remote repository. * * @see #setChanging(boolean)
